GET /api.description: serves up a json representation of all the available endpoints of the api

GET /api/topics.description: serves an array of all topics

GET /api/articles.description: serves an array of all articles

GET /api/articles/:article_id.description: serves an article corresponding with the article_id provided in the endpoint

article.author: icellusedkars
article.title: Eight pug gifs that remind me of mitch

GET /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: serves an array containing all of the comments of the article_id given in the endpoint; most recent first

comments.author: David
comments.body: This morning, I showered for nine minutes.

exampleBody.body: This was a great read, good article

postedComment.author: rogersop
postedComment.body: This was a great read, good article

PATCH /api/articles/:article_id.description: updates the votes by the given number in the body of the article specified in the endpoint the serves the updated article

updatedArticle.author: icellusedkars
updatedArticle.title: Eight pug gifs that remind me of mitch

DELETE /api/comments/comment_id.description: delete a comment corresponding to the comment_id provided in the endpoint and responds with no content

GET /api/users.description: serves an array of all users
